metadata.description: A collection of Claude Code plugins for development workflows

plugins.name: dot-claude
plugins.description: Claude skills and commands for PR management, test improvements, TDD workflows, and design processes

plugins.name: notifications
plugins.description: System notifications for Claude Code events (SessionStart, SessionEnd, Stop, Notification)

plugins.name: obsidian-bridge
plugins.description: Auto-document Claude sessions to an Obsidian vault via SessionEnd hook
